doc.field: This dataset outlines areas that had residential land use in 1945 and 1959 as shown on a map included in the Metropolitan Land Study, dated April 1960.

<?xml version="1.0"?><metadata> <idinfo> <citation> <citeinfo> <origin>Metropolitan Council</origin> <pubdate>Unpublished material</pubdate> <title>1945 and 1959 Residential Land Use</title> <mgmg1cid>N/A</mgmg1cid> <pubinfo> <publish>Metropolitan Council</publish> </pubinfo> <onlink>ftp://gisftp.metc.state.mn.us/ResidentialLandUse1945and1959.zip</onlink> </citeinfo> </citation> <descript> <abstract>This dataset outlines areas that had residential land use in 1945 and 1959 as shown on a map included in the Metropolitan Land Study, dated April 1960.</abstract> <purpose>The data was collected by scanning and digitizing the Residential Land Use map (Figure 13) from page 30 of the Metropolitan Land Study prepared by the Metropolitan Planning Commission in April 1960, so that it is available in digital form and may be used as a historical reference layer in GIS.</purpose> <supplinf>Portion of Twin Cities 7 County Metropolitan Area defined by the study area. This includes the counties of Anoka, Carver, Dakota, Hennepin, Ramsey, Scott and Washington in Minnesota.</supplinf> </descript> <timeperd> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>1959</caldate> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <current>Date the data collected for the 1959 land use on the map.</current> </timeperd> <status> <progress>Complete</progress> <update>None planned</update> </status> <spdom> <bounding> <westbc>-94.012</westbc> <eastbc>-92.732</eastbc> <northbc>45.415</northbc> <southbc>44.471</southbc> </bounding> </spdom> <keywords> <theme> <themekt>None</themekt> <themekey>land use, residential, planning and development</themekey> </theme> <place> <placekey>Twin Cities, Anoka County, Carver County, Dakota County, Hennepin County, Ramsey County, Scott County, Washington County</placekey> </place> </keywords> <accconst>None</accconst> <useconst>None</useconst> <ptcontac> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>Tanya Mayer</cntper> <cntorg>Metropolitan Council</cntorg> </cntperp> <cntpos>GIS Coordinator</cntpos> <cntaddr> <addrtype> mailing and physical address </addrtype> <address>390 Robert Street North</address> <city>St. Paul</city> <state>Minnesota</state> <postal>55101-1805</postal> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>651.602.1604</cntvoice> <cntfax>651.602.1674</cntfax> <cntemail>tanya.mayer@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail> </cntinfo> </ptcontac> <browse> <browsen>http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/bg/ResidentialLandUse1945and1959.jpg</browsen> <browsed>Sample map showing the ResidentialLandUse1945and1959 layer</browsed> </browse> <native>ArcInfo Version 8x</native> <crossref> <citeinfo> <title>1) stdyarea45_59 - delineation of the Metropolitan Land Study Residential Development study area. 2) 1958 General Land Use Map published for the 'The Challenge of Metropolitan Growth', the Metropolitan Planning Commission's (MPC) 1st report. 3) Industrial Land Use map (Fig. 11, pg.n Land Study, by the MPC.</title> </citeinfo> </crossref> </idinfo> <dataqual> <attracc> <attraccr>Unknown</attraccr> </attracc> <logic>The dataset is topologically 'clean'.</logic> <complete>A portion of the seven county geographic area is covered, as defined by the study area on the original map (stdyarea45_59 shape file).</complete> <posacc> <horizpa> <horizpar>The positional accuracy of the dataset has not been tested under the National Standards for Spatial Data Accuracy.</horizpar> </horizpa> <vertacc> <vertaccr /> </vertacc> </posacc> <lineage> <srcinfo> <srcscale /> </srcinfo> <procstep> <procdesc>Original Data for the Residential Land Use map (Fig 13) from the Metropolitan Land Study, 4/1960, showing 1945 and 1959 residential land use was collected from 1945 aerial photographs and 1958 aerial photographs updated with field checks in 1959.
The digital data was collected by scanning and digitizing the Residential Land Use map (Figure 13) from page 30 of the Metropolitan Land Study prepared by the Metropolitan Planning Commission in April 1960.</procdesc> </procstep> </lineage> </dataqual> <spdoinfo> <indspref>None</indspref> <direct>Vector</direct> <mgmg3obj>arcs, nodes, polygons, label points</mgmg3obj> <mgmg3til>One layer for entire seven county region.</mgmg3til> </spdoinfo> <spref> <horizsys> <geograph> <latres /> <longres /> <geogunit /></geograph> <planar> <mapproj> <mapprojn /> <mgmg4par /> <otherprj /> </mapproj> <gridsys> <gridsysn>UTM</gridsysn> <utm> <utmzone>15</utmzone> </utm> <spcs> <spcszone /> </spcs> <mgmg4coz /> <mgmg4adj /> </gridsys> <planci> <coordrep> <absres /> <ordres /> </coordrep> <distbrep> <distres /> </distbrep> <plandu>Meters</plandu> </planci> </planar> <geodetic> <horizdn>NAD83</horizdn> <ellips>GRS80</ellips> </geodetic> </horizsys> <vertdef> <altsys> <altdatum /> <altunits /> </altsys> <depthsys> <depthdn /> <depthdu /> </depthsys> </vertdef> </spref> <eainfo> <overview> <eaover>RESDEVYR: Residential Development Year 4, 4, C
Possible Codes = 0, 1945, 1959</eaover> <eadetcit>Metropolitan Land Study, Metropolitan Planning Report Number Four, April 1960, Twin Cities Metropolitan Planning Commission</eadetcit> </overview> </eainfo> <distinfo> <distrib> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>Mark Kotz</cntper> <cntorg>Metropolitan Council</cntorg> </cntperp> <cntpos>GIS Database Administrator</cntpos> <cntaddr> <addrtype> mailing and physical address </addrtype> <address>390 Robert Street North</address> <city>St. Paul</city> <state>Minnesota</state> <postal>55101-1805</postal> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>651.602.1644</cntvoice> <cntfax>651.602.1674</cntfax> <cntemail>mark.kotz@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail> </cntinfo> </distrib> <resdesc>ResidentialLandUse1945and1959</resdesc> <distliab>NOTICE: The Geographic Information System (GIS) Data to which this notice is attached are made available pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13).
